description.en: we've built Spain's leading platform for obtaining public aid from scratch. the stack is based on vue and laravel in their latest versions. we've managed to reach the 'Lanzadera' incubator and have integrated processes into agile and SCRUM methodologies using Notion as a problem-solving hub. additionally, we created a discord bot that alerts us to outages and new vulnerabilities.
